sentences.english: Kaifeng, the capital of Song Dynasty, was divided into several compartments, each with its own characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 宋都開封分爲數廂，每廂各有特點。

sentences.english: I think I am quite a person.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲我是踊個廂當有耐心賭人。
